scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
